lostsocket sorry, bla bla will retry or: Ooops, unfortunately Data Dealer has lost its connection to the server. Please try to reconnect again after a few seconds. If that fails: Is your computer's internet connection steady and fast enough? More details can be found here: FAQ.
user description: If you should experience any problems with your account or you want to have it removed, please write an email to: inout@datadealer.com
karma_popup description: Is the way you do business always properly appreciated? Do you keep on the right side of the law? Didn’t think so. As soon as you start collecting profiles, your corporate image will deteriorate. Keeping on top is risky stuff, you know. Run ads, get a lawyer or expand your privacy policy to rectify it. Just be careful – once your image goes into the red, you better act fast.
sb_profiles subtitle %s from %s profiles: You’ve captured %s of %s available people in your database.
sb_profiles description: Collect even more profiles! Take care: “Collecting” is only half the battle. You need to integrate all of the newly collected profiles into your database to see your current score. And never forget: Every dirty detail counts. The more attributes you collect and the more complete your database is as a result, the more it’s worth! By the way: When you expand to a new city, your reach will increase.
sb_cash description: Whether you’re utilizing your network of contacts, agents and pushers or upgrading your companies and online ventures, it’s all about the green, yo. Make regular deals with your customers to stay out of the red and prevent your data empire from losing ground.
sb_AP description: Each day only has 24 hours, and your energy is limited – make it count! But don’t worry if it runs out again. Just wait a little, and soon you’ll be fit as a fiddle. If you make it to the next level, the rush of endorphins will pep you right up anyway.
sb_XP description %s XP until next level: Each of your actions earns you experience! When you reach enough experience points (XP) for the next level, you’ll also unlock new items! To get to the next level you still need %s XP.
database_buytokens subtitle: Turn your database into a data machine!
database_buytokens description: Your collected attributes are truly worth their weight in gold! But you can get even more out of them: If you analyze them and link them up with each other, you can gain additional juicy details on your profiles. Soon you’ll know these people better than they know themselves! Just get some of these upgrades for your database.
Do you really want to delete and reset y: Do you really want to delete and reset your game? (All your progress will be lost, forever!)
projectbuy_proxyslotsfull: Sorry, all slots in use. Get yourself another bogus company to start new ventures!
topscore cash text %s: You didn't make it to the top yet, but you've got more cash than %s of all other data dealers, yeah.
topscore profiles text %s: You didn't make it to the top yet, but you've collected more profiles than %s of all other players, yeah.
topscore xp text %s: You didn't make it to the top yet, but you've got more xp than %s of all other players, yeah.
topscore spent text %s: You didn't make it to the top yet, but you've earned & invested more cash than %s of all other players!
topscore cash inranking: Congrats, you've hoarded loads of cash and you're amongst the top 50 of all data dealers. Keep it up!
topscore profiles inranking: Congrats, you've collected enough people's profiles to find yourself in the top 50 of all data dealers! Right on.
topscore xp text inranking: Congrats, you're amongst the 50 most experienced data dealers! Top notch, keep it up!
topscore spent text inranking: Congrats, you've burned enough cash to call yourself a serious top 50 investor. Keep the cash flow pumping!
ntext_upgrade Upgrade is now available i: New upgrade available! To get them, click on: %s
ntext_ad Ad is now available in projects: New ad available! To buy, click on: %s
ntext_server Ad is now available in proj: New server available! To buy, click on: %s
ntext_teammember teammember is now avail: Expand your team! To hire, click on: %s
ntext_agent click on %s: New agent found! Click on %s to recruit them. Moving along nicely!
ntext_contact click on %s: New contact available! Click on %s to start making deals!
ntext_pusher click on %s: New pusher found! Click on %s to recruit them. Well done them!
ntext_client click on %s: New client available! Click on %s to check them out right away. You need that income!
ntext_proxy click on %s: New bogus company available! To buy, click on: %s
ntext_city click on: Okay, this is big: New city unlocked! Click on %s and expand as fast as you can!
ntext_token click on upgrade in the data: New database upgrade %s! Take a look in your database and click on Expand to buy it.
ntext_project click on %s: New bogus company available! To buy, click on: %s
upgrade_tab text:
Upgrade your ventures!
Choose between several upgrades to gain more profiles, additional attributes or other advantages. Just be careful: well-developed data mines are more expensive to maintain.
ad_tab text:
Advertising is everything!
Plaster events with your logo or buy yourself a celeb. And don’t forget to make use of online and viral marketing alongside classic ad campaigns.Just be careful: ad campaigns require constant funding.
teammember_tab text:
Assemble your team!
Choosing the right people for the job is hard work and doesn’t always come cheap. Then once you’ve finally got them, the bloodsuckers demand regular wages, too. Annoying, but still necessary to get your empire off the ground.
upgrade_slotbuy description: Maxed out your upgrades? Choose how many upgrade slots you want to add. But note: There's no volume discount!
ad_slotbuy description: Maxed out your ads? Choose how many ad slots you want to add. But note: There's no volume discount!
server_slotbuy description: Add new slots so you can buy more servers. Choose how many slots you want.
teammember_slotbuy description: All seats are taken? Choose how many cubicles you want to add. But note: There's no volume discount!
levelup level %s! %s XP to level %s. %s: Wow! You’ve reached Level %s! Gain %s XP to get to Level %s. You now have %s Energy at your disposal. Keep it up!
Sorry, currently I have<br />no new cont:
Sorry, at the moment I have
no new contacts for you.
mission_done text: Misson accomplished, well done! You deserve a small reward.
All these new profiles need to be integr: All these new profiles need to be imported into your main database. If you already have information on some of these people, your database will try to identify and update existing profiles using complicated mathematical methods.
Sorry, currently there are <br />no new: Sorry, there are no new business opportunities right now.
user Folgende Daten haben wir ueber dich: We've collected the following data about you:
user text below:
...and some more tiny details! ;)
Data Dealer background info & FAQ? Check datadealer.com/beta
userdebug reset game text: Do you want to delete and reset your game and start again from scratch? Caution: All your game progress (levels, XP, profiles, items, cash, your ranks in the top 50) will be lost, forever!
subpopup_token description: Your database can analyze and combine this attribute with others, and calculate interesting new information from that. No sense using it unless you collected new data since your last analysis though.
Please choose a Nickname under which you: Please choose a Nickname under which you will be know to other Data Dealers
